abstract: Mobile advertising is about to enter the mainstream after Twitter and Facebook recently announced that they would soon begin presenting ads to users on mobile devices. A research report estimates that United States mobile ad spending will grow 80 percent to $2.61 billion in 2012.

headline.main: In the Age of the Smartphone, Ads Go Mobile
